attributes.action: Require a Parliamentary majority to invoke Article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty.
attributes.additional_details: With 48.1% of the electorate not in favour of leaving the European Union, with 3 million people signing a petition asking for another referendum, with evidence becoming apparent that people may have been knowingly misled about the EU, the minimum requirement is a parliamentary discussion about the implications.
attributes.background: We the undersigned ask for any decision to invoke Article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty to be debated in parliament and to require a parliamentary majority. With the decision having serious repercussions (especially for young people), the sensible route is not to invoke Article  50 too hastily.
